law.catch_line: The Commission consists of 29 voting members who are appointed by the Governor, as follows:...

section.section: Of the 2 Worcester County members from the Atlantic Coastal Bays Watershed, 1 shall be the Mayor of Ocean City.

text.section: A member of the Commission who does not hold another office of profit at the State or local level shall be entitled to compensation as provided in the budget. Members of the Commission shall be entitled to reimbursement for expenses as provided in the budget.

If a vacancy arises other than by the expiration of a term, the Governor shall appoint within 30 days, with the advice and consent of the Senate, a successor of like qualification to serve the remainder of the term.

section.section: A quorum of the Commission consists of 1 member more than a majority of the full authorized membership of the Commission.
A quorum of a panel of the Commission consists of 3 members.
The Commission or a panel of the Commission may not hold a public hearing unless a quorum is present.

The Commission or a panel of the Commission may not take any official action unless:
A quorum is present; and
A majority of the members who are present and eligible to vote concur in or vote for the action.
